import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import {Carousel, Image} from "react-bootstrap" import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux" import Loader from "./Loader" import Message from "./Message" import {listTopProducts} from "../actions/productAction" import { productTopRatedReducer } from '../reducers/productReducer' export default function ProductCarousel() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const productTopRated = useSelector(state => state.productTopRated) const {loading, error, products} = productTopRated useEffect(()=>{dispatch(listTopProducts())}, [dispatch]) return ( loading? : error? {error} : (
{ products.map(product=> (

{product.name} ({product.price})

)) }
) ) }
